author: poojaranjan
content:
**EIPIP Meeting 82**
Date and Time: May 31, 2023 at 14:00 UTC
Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/235

author: poojaranjan
content:
Starting in ~30 mins 
Join Zoom Meeting
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/82357016731?pwd=V0hLUWIvU2V2UTdUd216WHdGNFBKUT09

author: samwilsn
content:
Meeting summary:
 * We're going to loosen the regex used for `consensus-specs` (and others) to allow `/tree/` links (so entire directories) and `/compare/` links (for pull request _contents_) so long as they are identified by commits.
* Discussed recommending/requiring one or more reference implementations for ERCs.
* No updates on automatically assigning EIP numbers yet.
